name: FlipPix Art - Home
description:
New! FlipPix Art - Home is now designed for both the iPhone and the iPad!

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

FlipPix Art – Home has 6 scenes containing a total of 201 puzzles in a variety of sizes from 5x5 to 15x15. Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art – Home puzzles are designed for both the iPhone and iPad and range from easy to very challenging levels of play.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
